Posts.Content: On Jan 17, 2011 2:09 AM JoyceJJL wrote: Sounds like the same symptoms as Fermara.  they're not pleasant.   Do you take vitamin D?  They mentioned taking calcium with vitamin D in them to me I only take the calcium pills that my doctor prescribed she has me taking two calcium pills a day.  I go back in Feb for my f/u.  She also wants me to do a Bone Density Scan.
Posts.Title: Ariimedex

Posts.Content: I've been on Arimidex since Nov 2010. I have the achy joints.  I hurt the most when I first wake up or when I've been sitting for a long time, but after I get moving I'm fine. I've had only a few headaches and I take calcium pills. I've also tried to exercise to keep from getting achy.
Posts.Title: Ariimedex
